context: Together Lily, David, and Bodhi collected 43 insects. Lily found 7 more than David. David found half of what Bodhi found. How many insects did Lily find?
subquestions: Define a variable How many insects did David collect? How many insects did Lily collect? Write an equation Simplify Simplify How many insects did David collect? How many insects did Lily collect? How many insects did Lily collect?
subanswers: Let B = the number of insects Bodhi collected David = B/2 Lily = B/2 + 7 B + B + 7 = 43 2B = <<36=36>>36 B = <<18=18>>18 insects David = 18/2 = <<18/2=9>>9 insects Lily = 9 + 7 = <<9+7=16>>16 insects Lily found <<16=16>>16 insects.

context: Bahati, Azibo, and Dinar each contributed to their team's 45 points. Bahati scored the most points and it was 20 more than Azibo scored and 10 more points than Dinar scored. How many points did Azibo score?
subquestions: Define a variable How many points did Azibo score? How many points did Dinar score? Write an equation Simplify Simplify Divide by 3 How many points did Azibo score? How many points did Azibo score?
subanswers: Let B = the number of points Bahati scored Azibo = B - 20 Dinar = B - 10 B + B -20 + B - 10 = 45 3B - 30 = 45; 3B = 75 B = <<25=25>>25 Azibo = 25 - 20 = <<25-20=5>>5 points Azibo scored 5 points.
